name: Hollow Knight 3D demo
description:
SPOILER WARNING! THIS DOES CONTAINT SPOILERS FOR THE GAME HOLLOW KNIGHT!

This project is based on the existing game Hollow Knight, mabe by Team Cherry. I do not own the characters or world this project is based on.

Welcome to my Hollow Knight 3D demo! First of all, this is only a demo, and it's only meant to be a demo. I do not have any plans of making a complete game or any more areas/content. This was made as a school project for me to improve on 3D and trying to learn some Unity.

I chose to work with Hollow Knight, because I love the game and the universe, and wanted the challenge of turning a world from 2D to 3D. This demo isn't 100% accurate in terms of world and story, but I tried keeping as close to the source material as I could.

CONTROLS:
Walking: W, A, S, D
Camera: I, J, K, L
Sword: Lshift
Jump: Space
NPC interaction: E

This should also work with an Xbox controler. There you use the joysticks, and A, X, B for jumping, sword and talking. (I do not know if any other controlers work)

The demo ends after the credits
